site_name: Hurlingham Club Ranelagh GardensLondonSW6 3PR
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Map 1T1, 39 Napier Avenue (adj Lime Cottage) - Robinia - cut back lower pendulous branches overhanging Lime Cottage roof from 39 Napier Avenue, due to rubbing in the wind, to give 1.5m clearanceT2 & T3, Lime Cottage - apples - reduce back to previous points and thin crown by 20%Map 2T10056 - Sycamore - reduce crown by 2.5m due to excessive shading - deadwoodT10238 - twin stemmed bay - reduce by 4m and turn into topiary ball.T10232 & 10233 - Hollies - reduce by 3-4m and turn into low hedge behind bayT10242 - oak - leaning on Holly, removeT10242 - Yew - reduce height by 2m and shape to remove from crown of neighbouring beech tree.
